Text: I will wait for the re-play (which should be monday) and the re-up if you're having this problem. Thanks for being one of the few LEGITIMATE hosts of this episode.
No Monday rerun unfortunately, this cap is as good as it gets for a while.
eh, i'll take what i can get. If it's bad, i'll wait up on hosting it to youtube.
i'm hosting the episode to youtube. Your audio glitch issue wasn't horrible, but i'll note in the description if an issue pops up. Channel name's same as my TPB user.
